title: A graphite/amorphous diamond coupled framework with high ORR and OER performance applied as a cathode catalyst in zincâ€“air batteries

Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, 8,2880-2888

Yizhi Yin, Dandan Ma, Huize Liu, Guandong Wang, Chenfeng Lin, Jinfu Ma
A B,N co-doped graphite/amorphous diamond coupling framework was designed to increase the amount of sp3 carbon inside the material, construct the sp2/sp3 carbon interface.
